1   package org.lindbergframework.test.beans;
2   
3   import java.util.Date;
4   import java.util.List;
5   
6   import org.lindbergframework.validation.Types;
7   import org.lindbergframework.validation.annotation.Valid;
8   import org.lindbergframework.validation.annotation.Validations;
9   
10  /**
11   * 
12   * @author Victor Lindberg (victor.silva@serpro.gov.br)
13   * 
14   */
15  public class ValidationBean1 {
16  
17      @Validations({@Valid(value = Types.REQUIRED_FIELD,msg = "msg1"),
18                    @Valid(value = Types.REQUIRED_FIELD_NO_INFORMATION_EMPTY,msg = "msg4", actions = "action1"),
19                    @Valid("myValidation1")})
20      private String name;
21      
22      @Validations({@Valid(Types.REQUIRED_FIELD),
23                    @Valid(value = Types.DATE_CAN_NOT_BE_PRESENT, msg = "msg2")})
24      private Date date;
25      
26      @Valid(value = Types.MUST_BE_EMPTY_LIST, msg = "msg5", actions = "mustBeEmptyListTest")
27      private List<String> list;
28      
29      /**
30       * Construtor padrÃ£o.
31       */
32      public ValidationBean1() {
33          //
34      }
35  
36      public String getName() {
37          return name;
38      }
39  
40      public void setName(String name) {
41          this.name = name;
42      }
43  
44      public Date getDate() {
45          return date;
46      }
47  
48      public void setDate(Date date) {
49          this.date = date;
50      }
51  
52      public List<String> getList() {
53          return list;
54      }
55  
56      public void setList(List<String> list) {
57          this.list = list;
58      }
